action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Mechanical Engineering
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Two years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Master
OTHER-SKILLS: Research
AVAILABILITY: In two weeks

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the interviewer know what your bachelor's degree is? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ME:  What is your highest education level? Please answer with the degree.

ANSWER: Master.

ME:  What is your industry experience? Please answer with the number of years.

ANSWER: Two years.

ME:  What are your other skills? Please answer with the specific skills.

ANSWER: Research.

ME:  What is your availability? Please answer
NA

ME: Thank you. Please expand on your bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering. What did you learn during your studies?

probes.question: ME: If I asked the interviewer when you are able to start working, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer:

When the interviewer asks when you are able to start working, would you be able to give a specific date or would you need more information about the job requirements and your availability? Please answer with either "I can give a specific date" or "I need more information about the job requirements and my availability."
